scripts.prestart: ./wait-for-it.sh localhost:7687 --timeout=5 --strict -- echo 'Neo4j Dev DB is up' && ./wait-for-it.sh localhost:7688 --timeout=5 --strict -- echo 'Neo4j Test DB is up'
scripts.pretest: ./wait-for-it.sh bolt://localhost:7687 --timeout=5 --strict -- echo 'Neo4j Dev DB is up' && ./wait-for-it.sh bolt://localhost:7688 --timeout=5 --strict -- echo 'Neo4j Test DB is up'
